trans-unit.source: Represents a subscription to a timer event.
trans-unit.target: 代表訂閱計時器事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> objects are added to the timer queue associated with a workflow instance in order to send a message to a specific <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> at a specified time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> 物件會加入至與工作流程執行個體關聯的計時器佇列中，以在指定時間傳送訊息至特定的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>。

trans-unit.source: When the time specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> is reached, the workflow runtime engine sends a message containing the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 達到 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> 指定的時間時，工作流程執行階段引擎會傳送包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> 的訊息到 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> 指定的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The timer queue associated with a workflow instance is contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 與工作流程執行個體關聯的計時器佇列包含在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> 中。

trans-unit.source: You can examine <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo> objects returned by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to determine which activities are waiting on a specific <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢查 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo> 傳回的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 物件，以判斷哪些活動在特定的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> 上等待。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> both use timer event subscriptions to provide part of their functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> 都使用計時器事件訂閱來提供它們的部分功能。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with this subscription.
trans-unit.target: 與此訂閱關聯之工作流程執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) at which the timer associated with this subscription is expected to expire.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，代表與此訂閱關聯的計時器將到期的時間 (依照全球定位時間 (UTC))。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of a workflow instance and the specified expiration <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作流程執行個體的指定 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> 和指定的到期 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the system-supplied <xref:System.Guid> for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid> 之系統提供的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A system-supplied <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: 系統提供的 <xref:System.Guid>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance, specified by `workflowInstanceId`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid> 指定之工作流程執行個體的 `workflowInstanceId`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> specified by `expiresAt`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> 指定的 `expiresAt`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> is initialized to a string representation of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式將 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> 初始化為 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> for this subscription.
trans-unit.target: 此訂閱的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance for which this subscription was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立此訂閱之工作流程執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) at which the timer for this subscription is expected to expire.
trans-unit.target: 依照全球定位時間 (UTC) 的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，代表與此訂閱關聯的計時器將到期的時間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> class by using the specified subscription Id, the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of a workflow instance, and the specified expiration <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訂閱 ID、工作流程執行個體的指定 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> 與指定的到期 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 類別的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the <xref:System.Guid> specified by `timerId`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid> 指定之 `timerId` 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> specified by `timerId`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid> 指定的 `timerId`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance, specified by `workflowInstanceId`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid> 指定之工作流程執行個體的 `workflowInstanceId`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> specified by `expiresAt`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> 指定的 `expiresAt`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> is initialized to a string representation of `timerId` by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式將 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> 初始化為 `timerId` 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets the expected expiration time of the timer associated with this subscription.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此訂閱關聯之計時器的預期到期時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) at which the timer associated with this subscription is expected to expire.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，代表與此訂閱關聯的計時器將到期的時間 (依照全球定位時間 (UTC))。

trans-unit.source: Represents the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> sends a message to when the timer subscription expires.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> 的名稱，當計時器訂閱到期時 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 會傳送訊息給該佇列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> interface for a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier that represents a timer event
trans-unit.target: 代表計時器事件的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> representing the unique identifier for a timer event
trans-unit.target: 代表計時器事件唯一識別碼的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifier of the workflow associated with the timer subscription
trans-unit.target: 與計時器訂閱關聯之工作流程的識別項。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> representing the unique identifier for the workflow associated with the timer subscription.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，代表與計時器訂閱關聯之工作流程的唯一識別碼。
